thread.title: Portland Small Business Owner
thread.title_full: Fundbox reviewed by Portland Small Business Owner

author: Portland Small Business Owner
title: Portland Small Business Owner
text: Our small business is in a growth phase with large amounts out in invoicing, due to us within a weeks time but payroll due despite whether clients paid on time. We no longer have the stress that comes along with making payroll because we have the peace of mind that comes with knowing we have a line of credit that will cover all hard line expenses, despite cash flow. The amount of stress that has been relieved from our business has been invaluable. I would recommend Fundbox to any small business with intermittent cash flow problems.
